title: User stories analyzser
text: UserStory Doctor is here to help you create clear, concise, and effective user stories for your development projects. By analyzing your user stories using advanced linguistic checks, we identify common defects such as missing roles, unclear objectives, or inconsistent formatting. This feedback allows you to improve your stories, making them more actionable for your team. Whether you're new to writing user stories or an experienced product owner, our tool helps ensure that your requirements are always well-defined, uniform, enhancing collaboration, communication, and overall product quality.
